name: Lighthouz AI
long_description:
Lighthouz AI is building AI procurement specialists to automate B2B purchasing. It 2x'es the productivity of procurement teams by automating manual workflows and increases cost savings. 

Businesses waste $30B annually on manual procurement tasks, done on emails and spreadsheets, such as data entry on ERP, comparing quotes, creating POs, and communicating with vendors. 

Lighthouz introduces the AI Procurement Specialist that can autonomously handle manual procurement workflows. This multi AI agent system is powered by dynamic knowledge graphs extracted from unstructured data. Our system integrates with emails and ERP systems. 

Team has deep AI experience - Srijan has been a GaTech CS professor, ex-Google, Stanford, IIT; Sonali was a lead AI engineer at Progressive, American Family, Halliburton, ex-UW, IIT. Lighthouz AI brings decades of AI expertise to invent the future of procurement and supply chain.
one_liner: AI procurement specialists for autonomous B2B purchasing
